frame.name: Stage_of_progress
frame.definition:
<def-root>An <fen>Entity</fen> is at a particular stage of its development.
<ex> The <t>Next Generation</t> <fex name="ent">Internet</fex> (NGI) Program has been successfully completed.</ex>
<ex>Osama bin Laden, prime suspect in the US terror attacks, is outfoxing intelligence agencies with his <t>low-tech</t> <fex name="ent">communication methods</fex>.</ex> <ex><fex name="ent">Kids</fex> <m>are</m> <fex name="deg">much more</fex> <t>advanced</t> <fex name="tim">today</fex> <fex name="deg">than they were in our era</fex> that is for sure.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Entity
FE.definition:
<def-root>The object that has reached a particular stage of its development.
<ex>We offer advice for very <t>advanced</t> <fex name="ent">learners of English</fex> on the different EFL/ESL exams.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition:
<def-root>The time at which the progress occurs.
</def-root>

FE.name: Manner
FE.definition:
<def-root>A description of the stage of progress, frequently an evaluation.
<ex>The new version is <fex name="man">wonderfully</fex> <t>advanced</t>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition:
<def-root>The amount of advancement that the Entity has attained.
<ex> The province, which is <fex name="deg">very</fex> <t>developed</t> economically, is at the same time a center of brassworking.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Domain
FE.definition:
<def-root>The relevant dimension of development.
<ex> The Soviet Union was more highly <t>developed</t> <fex name="dom">militarily</fex> than China.</ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: mature.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: having reached a sufficiently developed stage in a process.

lexUnit.name: advanced.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: far on in progress or life

lexUnit.name: developed.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: having the specified level of development

lexUnit.name: next generation.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: belonging to the next stage of advancement

lexUnit.name: low-tech.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: involved in or employing low technology.

lexUnit.name: modern.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: characterized by or using the most up-to-date techniques, equipment, etc.

lexUnit.name: generation.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: a particular stage in the development of an item constituting a set of said item.

lexUnit.name: state-of-the-art.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: encompassing the very best in latest technology and innovation

lexUnit.name: high-tech.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: uses high, or advanced, technology

lexUnit.name: old-fashioned.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: belonging to an older stage of achievement
